about_the_game:
Dive into the challenge of constructing and optimizing the production line for the world's most powerful rocket, Starship. As the manager of your own Starbase, you’ll build the factory, tank farm, launch mounts, and vehicles necessary for the colonization of Mars!

Build Your Factory:

Transform an empty plot into a bustling hub of productivity with cutting-edge technology. Optimize your factory to accelerate the production of ships required for the journey to Mars.

Test, Launch, Iterate:

Space is unforgiving, and it’s up to you to create vehicles resilient enough to withstand the rigors of spaceflight. Put your creations to the test at the launch site, utilizing telemetry and cameras to track their progress. Refine your factory design based on real-time feedback to achieve flawless flights.

Existing Features:

  • Versatile factory and launch site construction enabling countless layouts and configurations

  • An extensive inventory of resources, propellants, and vehicle components for assembly and management

  • Nine fully functional vehicles, each with their own test campaigns.

  • Ten distinct test scenarios, from propellant load to 200-meter hops and 10-kilometer belly-flop landings

Roadmap:

  • Orbital Launches

  • OLT Catches

  • Automation

  • Much more!
